main event: On August 3, 1952, a CAA engineer observed three oblong translucent objects in an inverted V formation for nine minutes at Kirtland AFB, New Mexico.
interesting points: The objects tumbled and flip-flopped during the observation,The sighting occurred at 2220 MST at an altitude of approximately 13,500 feet,There was no visible exhaust or sound from the objects,The observation lasted for a total of 9 minutes,There was good visibility of 30 miles with a near full moon present.
sighted object: three oblong translucent objects in inverted V formation
